name: Drakeon
description: The Elementist Pokémon. Drakeon is the rarest naturally occuring Eevee evolution. Legends speak of its ability to control and manipulate elemental energies, bestowing it with an array of versatile breath attacks.

abilities.name: Intimidate
abilities.description: Once per short rest, you can impose disadvantage on an enemy attack roll of your choice.

abilities.name: Inner Focus
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to flinching.
